description:
This course uses Joomla 2.5, which is no longer supported by the Joomla! Development team.

You should not use this course unless you are maintaining an older Joomla 2.5 website.

Time is a luxury these days. With all the distractions in our lives, it's hard to justify watching 20hrs worth of videos to get a basic site up and running. We have provided step by step instructions, in an hour, on how doing it with the latest technologies on this â€œJoomla Training with Joomla Tutorial for Beginners". And best of all, it will be ready to upgrade when you are!

Included with the Joomla Training course are the content files for easy copy and pasting, base images that can be easily modified with any graphical editor as well as a quick start package of the completed website for setup within minutes.

Buy this ultimate Joomla Training course and learn from Joomla Tutorial for Beginners.
title: Learn How To Build A Corporate Website Using Joomla! 2.5
